casebody.data:
HELLER & COMPANY, Appellant, v. SIMSON BROTHERS, Inc., and Karlan & Bleicher, Appellees. No. 31. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. Oct. 30, 1939. Lemlein & Wolsky, of New York City (Nathaniel Frucht, of Providence, R. I., and Max Schwartz, of Brooklyn, N. Y., of counsel), for appellant. Dyke & Schaines, of New York City (Herbert H. Dyke, of New York City, and W. R. Lieberman, of Brooklyn, N. Y., of counsel), for appellees.

Before L. HAND, SWAN, and AUGUSTUS N. HAND, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Decree affirmed.
